azure.storage.cloudstorageaccount module¶

class azure.storage.cloudstorageaccount.CloudStorageAccount(account_name=None, account_key=None)[source]¶

Bases: object

Provides a factory for creating the blob, queue, and table services with a common account name and account key. Users can either use the factory or can construct the appropriate service directly.

create_blob_service()[source]¶
create_queue_service()[source]¶
create_table_service()[source]¶
